name: draco-mesh-web-decoder
description: A version of the draco mesh decoder for the browser

scripts.build-draco: mkdir -p src/draco-build && cd src/draco-build && cmake ../ && make -j4 && sed -i '$ a\export default DracoMeshWebDecoder;' draco_decoder.js
scripts.build-str-import: mkdir -p src/tmp && node script/wasm_str.js && rollup -c rollup.config.worker.js && node script/worker_str.js
scripts.build: npm run build-draco && npm run build-str-import && rollup -c

author: jvail
